meanings.definition: A person who washes clothes for a living.
meanings.sent1: The washermen in our neighborhood always make sure our clothes are clean.
meanings.sent2: The washermen come by every Monday to pick up our laundry.
meanings.sent3: The washermen had a race to see who could wash and dry the fastest!
meanings.sent4: The washermen were like magicians, making stains disappear with their soapy potions.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the cheerful faces of the washermen as they handed back our freshly cleaned clothes.
